attrLengthWiseBias.name: bias
attrLengthWiseBias.comment: Modulates the shape of blending between base and tip color. < 0.5 pushes the center of the blend towards the base, and > 0.5 towards the tip.

attrLengthWiseGain.name: gain
attrLengthWiseGain.comment: Modulates the shape of blending between base and tip color. < 0.5 is higher contrast in the middle of the blend. > 0.5 is higher contrast at the start and end, and lower contrast in the middle.

attrHairColumnUvColor.name: column_uv_color
attrHairColumnUvColor.label: column uv color
attrHairColumnUvColor.comment: Bound image map must have a HairColumnUvMap bound to its input texture coordinates.
